description: Notification of process exceeding CPU utilization threshold. Notification is send every extremeCpuMonitorInterval value in seconds until utilization falls below threshold.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::extremeSwMonitorCpuUtilization EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::extremeCpuMonitorSlotId u 9999 EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::extremeCpuMonitorProcessName s EXAMPLE EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::extremeCpuMonitorCurrentUtilization s EXAMPLE EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::extremeCpuMonitorThreshold i 0

description: Slot Id of the process monitored.
variables.name: EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::extremeCpuMonitorSlotId

description: Name associated with the reported process id.
variables.name: EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::extremeCpuMonitorProcessName

description: Percentage of the amount of time recorded in seconds that the process spends occupying CPU resources. This value is reported in extremeSwMonitorCpuUtilization and extremeSwMonitorCpuUtilizationNormal trap.
variables.name: EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::extremeCpuMonitorCurrentUtilization

description: Threshold for CPU Aggregation utilization trap
variables.name: EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::extremeCpuMonitorThreshold

description: The service expiry notification is generated about 90 days service contract expiration, then 60,30,7 days and daily after that.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::extremeServiceLicenseExpiration EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::extremeServiceLicenseExpiryDate s EXAMPLE EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::extremeServiceLicenseType s EXAMPLE EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::imageDescription s EXAMPLE EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::noOfDaysLeft i 0

description: This report the expiration date of the license.
variables.name: EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::extremeServiceLicenseExpiryDate

description: This report the service license type.
variables.name: EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::extremeServiceLicenseType

description: This report the image version on which license was enabled.
variables.name: EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::imageDescription

description: This report the number of days left to service license expire.
variables.name: EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::noOfDaysLeft

description: Trial license expiry notification is generated every day.
This report the number of days left to service license expire.
variables.name: EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::trialPeriod

description: This report the image version on which license was enabled.
variables.name: EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::imageDescription

description: This report the number of days left to service license expire.
variables.name: EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::noOfDaysLeft

description: Notification of process CPU utilization falling below threshold. The generation of this notification corresponds with the extremeSwMonitorCpuUtilization (CPU excessed threshold) notification. When the CPU utilization of the process that triggered the extremeSwMonitorCpuUtilization notification falls back below the configured threshold, this (return to normal) notification will be generated.

event.Summary: Process CPU utilization back to normal

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::extremeSwMonitorCpuUtilizationNormal EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::extremeCpuMonitorSlotId u 9999 EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::extremeCpuMonitorProcessName s EXAMPLE EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::extremeCpuMonitorCurrentUtilization s EXAMPLE EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::extremeCpuMonitorThreshold i 0

description: Slot Id of the process monitored.
variables.name: EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::extremeCpuMonitorSlotId

description: Name associated with the reported process id.
variables.name: EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::extremeCpuMonitorProcessName

description: Percentage of the amount of time recorded in seconds that the process spends occupying CPU resources. This value is reported in extremeSwMonitorCpuUtilization and extremeSwMonitorCpuUtilizationNormal trap.
variables.name: EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::extremeCpuMonitorCurrentUtilization

description: Threshold for CPU Aggregation utilization trap
variables.name: EXTREME-SOFTWARE-MONITOR-MIB::extremeCpuMonitorThreshold
